snippet: After a Times reporter’s live-tweeting about Mark Zuckerberg’s testimony in Dallas broke courthouse rules, he wrote about it. Unexpectedly, a court officer responded....

headline.main: Investors Bet Trump-Fueled Tech Rally Far From Over
headline.print_headline: Investors Bet Trump-Fueled Tech Rally Far From Over

lead_paragraph: After a Times reporter’s live-tweeting about Mark Zuckerberg’s testimony in Dallas broke courthouse rules, he wrote about it. Unexpectedly, a court officer responded.
